# UICollectionView.ReorderingCadence.slow

**Case**

Items are reordered after a delay.

## Declaration

```swift
case slow
```

## Constants

- **UICollectionView.ReorderingCadence.immediate**: Items are reordered into place immediately.
- **UICollectionView.ReorderingCadence.fast**: Items are reordered quickly, but with a short delay.

items.description: Items are reordered into place immediately.
items.name: UICollectionView.ReorderingCadence.immediate

items.description: Items are reordered quickly, but with a short delay.
items.name: UICollectionView.ReorderingCadence.fast
